mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM tb_goods WHERE goods_delete_yn = 'N'

SELECT goods_id, goods_name, goods_brand, goods_price, goods_purchs_link, goods_kwrd, goods_regist_date, goods_update_date, goods_delete_yn, f.goods_file_id, f.goods_file_path, f.goods_file_name FROM (SELECT g.*, ROWNUM AS RNUM, COUNT(*) OVER () AS TOTCNT FROM (SELECT goods_id, goods_name, goods_brand, goods_price, goods_purchs_link, goods_kwrd, goods_regist_date, goods_update_date, goods_delete_yn FROM tb_goods ORDER BY goods_id desc) g)
LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_goods_file f ON goods_id = f.goods_file_goods_id WHERE RNUM > #{start} AND RNUM <= #{end} and goods_delete_yn = 'N'

SELECT g.goods_id, g.goods_name, g.goods_brand, g.goods_price, g.goods_purchs_link, g.goods_kwrd, g.goods_regist_date, g.goods_update_date, g.goods_delete_yn, f.goods_file_id, f.goods_file_path, f.goods_file_name
FROM tb_goods g LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_goods_file f ON g.goods_id = f.goods_file_goods_id WHERE g.goods_id = #{goodsId} and g.goods_delete_yn = 'N'

SELECT g.goods_id, g.goods_name, g.goods_brand, g.goods_price, g.goods_purchs_link, g.goods_kwrd, g.goods_regist_date, g.goods_update_date, g.goods_delete_yn, f.goods_file_path, f.goods_file_name
FROM tb_goods g LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_goods_file f ON g.goods_id = f.goods_file_goods_id WHERE g.goods_id = #{goodsId} and g.goods_delete_yn = 'N'

SELECT g.goods_id, g.goods_name, g.goods_brand, g.goods_price, g.goods_purchs_link, g.goods_kwrd, g.goods_regist_date, g.goods_update_date, g.goods_delete_yn, f.goods_file_path, f.goods_file_name, f.goods_file_id
FROM tb_goods g LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_goods_file f ON g.goods_id = f.goods_file_goods_id WHERE g.goods_delete_yn = 'N' and (g.goods_kwrd LIKE ('%' || #{search} || '%') OR g.goods_brand LIKE ('%' || #{search} || '%') OR g.goods_name LIKE ('%' || #{search} || '%'))
